Description: Controls whether or not trends will dynamically update.
Controls how many lockable cursors are allowed on charts displayed on screens with 768 or more pixels of horizontal resolution (10 max).
Controls how many lockable cursors are allowed on charts displayed on screens with less than 768 pixels of horizontal resolution (10 max).
Controls whether calculations (equations) are displayed in chart cursors.
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on Trends.
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on Pareto Charts.
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on Bar Charts.
Controls whether or not gridlines are visible on XY Plots.
Length of time that timestamp based charts and tables can be scrolled.
Unit of time that timestamp based charts and tables can be scrolled.
Default width (in pixels) for all trend pens. This setting can be changed by the end user (Factory setting is 2).
